lead_paragraph: WEINER--Joyce Goldman, passed away at age 69 on October 24, 2015 in Glen Allen, Virginia. Joyce didn't cook but she mixed a mean Cosmopolitan. A native New Yorker whose quick wit and sense of humor made her unforgettable. Joyce was a loyal friend who never forgot a birthday. In good times and bad, she always had us laughing. She is survived by her adoring family: husband Dennis, daughter Jacqueline and grandson Jack, friends and loved ones. We miss her every day. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, JOYCE GOLDMAN
